definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: In the United Kingdom, on the eve of Halloween can be said is a Guijie.
sentences.chinese: 在英國，萬聖節前夕可以說是一個鬼節。

sentences.english: Shortly before I went abroad, this friend and I had been coeditor of a big book.
sentences.chinese: 出訪前夕，我還在與他合作主編一本大書。

sentences.english: Horace and the Gorgons gossip on the horrible Halloween.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉斯和蛇發女怪三姐妹在可怕的萬聖節前夕聊八卦。

sentences.english: The first time I dressed up as a woman was Hallowe'en1).
sentences.chinese: 我第一次男扮女裝是在一次萬聖節前夕。

sentences.english: On eve of official visit, President Hu Jintao says that the two states should not interfere in each other's domestic agenda.
sentences.chinese: 正式訪問前夕，胡主席表示兩國不應該干涉彼此內政。

sentences.english: But most just prayed that Halloween would be over as quickly as possible.
sentences.chinese: 不過大多數人倒是祈禱諸聖日前夕會盡快過去。

sentences.english: Some children make lanterns out of pumpkins at Hallowe'en.
sentences.chinese: 有些兒童在萬聖節前夕用南瓜做燈籠。

sentences.english: People have been making jack-o-lanterns at Halloween for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 幾個世紀來人們在萬聖節前夕製作南瓜燈。

sentences.english: A few days later, Halloween night, Holly's cousin is staying over.
sentences.chinese: 幾天後，萬聖節前夕夜晚，荷莉的表妹來過夜。

sentences.english: On Christmas Eve I hung up my stocking along with my sisters'.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕節前夕，我把我的長統襪跟姐妹們的掛在一起。

sentences.english: After dinner, all the family stays up late to welcome the New Year.
sentences.chinese: 在新年前夕，大家愛購置年貨，米西年夜飯。

sentences.english: like right before our winter break.
sentences.chinese: 恰好在我們的寒假前夕。

sentences.english: Camie and Fixer married before the Battle of Hoth.
sentences.chinese: 霍斯戰役前夕，卡米和男友舉行了他們的婚禮。

sentences.english: I left the University of Oklahoma right before Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 我在聖誕節前夕離開俄克拉何馬大學。

sentences.english: I'm writing an article on the feelings about graduation.
sentences.chinese: 我在寫一篇關於畢業前夕的感受的文章。

sentences.english: On the eve of their first season in the Premier League, Blackpool sign five players in one day to strengthen their ranks.
sentences.chinese: 黑池在他們首個英超賽季前夕一天內簽下了5名球員。

definition: to just happen to coincide with
Double Tenth, the anniversary of the Wuchang Uprising 武昌起義|武昌起义[Wu3 chang1 Qi3 yi4] of October 10th, 1911/(Tw) National Day
to be about to arrive/to be around the corner
on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
